title: Eight new unique gene mutations in patients with hereditable heart muscle disease

title_detail.value: Eight new unique gene mutations in patients with hereditable heart muscle disease

summary: Researchers have identified eight new gene mutations that may cause or contribute to idiopathic dilated cardiomyopathy, a form of heart disease not caused by known external influences, such as high blood pressure, obesity, smoking, or diseased coronary arteries.

summary_detail.value: Researchers have identified eight new gene mutations that may cause or contribute to idiopathic dilated cardiomyopathy, a form of heart disease not caused by known external influences, such as high blood pressure, obesity, smoking, or diseased coronary arteries.
